SEARCH
Package group19.GameLoop

Class PlayerTracker

java.lang.Object
group19.GameLoop.PlayerTracker
public class PlayerTracker extends Object
This class represents the moving enemy's player tracker / search algorithm

    • PlayerTracker

      public PlayerTracker(GameLoop gl)
      The constructor for this class, takes in gameloop screen/class and sets it for use in this class.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • fryCookTrackingPlayerMove

      public void fryCookTrackingPlayerMove(FryCook fryCook)
      The code for the frycook enemy to track the player and move in the player's direction.
      Parameters:
      fryCook - : the frycook to move towards the player.

    • xPathSearch

      public void xPathSearch(FryCook fryCook, Integer xDifference, Integer yDifference, Double random)
      If the player is farther away by their x - coordinate to the frycook enemy this method gets called. This method moves the frycook's x coordinate closer to the player. If x coordinate is 0 than force move the enemy to move around obstacles.
      Parameters:
      fryCook - : The frycook to move.
      xDifference - : The x coordinate difference between the frycook enemy and player.
      yDifference - : The y coordinate difference between the frycook enemy and player.
      random - : A random number between 0 and 1 , used to decide some movement logic.

    • yPathSearch

      public void yPathSearch(FryCook fryCook, Integer xDifference, Integer yDifference, Double random)
      If the player is farther away by their y - coordinate to the frycook enemy this method gets called. This method moves the frycook's y coordinate closer to the player. If y coordinate is 0 than force move the enemy to move around obstacles.
      Parameters:
      fryCook - : The frycook to move.
      xDifference - : The x coordinate difference between the frycook enemy and player.
      yDifference - : The y coordinate difference between the frycook enemy and player.
      random - : A random number between 0 and 1 , used to decide some movement logic.

    • setForceFromRightOrLeft

      public void setForceFromRightOrLeft(FryCook fryCook, Integer yDifference, Double random)
      This method gets called when the frycook enemy needs to get force moved around obstacles. Specifically if the enemy cannot move in the right or left direction. This method sets the frycook enemies force move direction.
      Parameters:
      fryCook - : The frycook to move.
      yDifference - : The y coordinate difference between the frycook enemy and player.
      random - : A random number between 0 and 1 , used to decide some movement logic.

    • setForceFromUpOrDown

      public void setForceFromUpOrDown(FryCook fryCook, Integer xDifference, Double random)
      This method gets called when the frycook enemy needs to get force moved around obstacles. Specifically if the enemy cannot move in the Up or Down direction. This method sets the frycook enemies force move direction.
      Parameters:
      fryCook - : The frycook to move.
      xDifference - : The x coordinate difference between the frycook enemy and player.
      random - : A random number between 0 and 1 , used to decide some movement logic.

    • forceFryCookMovement

      public void forceFryCookMovement(FryCook fryCook)
      This method checks to see if the forcefully moved frycook enemy can go in the forced direction.
      Parameters:
      fryCook - : The frycook to move.

    • forceFryCookLeftCheck

      public void forceFryCookLeftCheck(FryCook fryCook)
      This method decides if the frycook can move in the choosen direction forcefully. If yes then forcefully moves frycook in said direction to clear obstacles. If no then re-pick a new direction to force move.
      Parameters:
      fryCook - : The frycook to move.

    • forceFryCookUpCheck

      public void forceFryCookUpCheck(FryCook fryCook)
      This method decides if the frycook can move in the choosen direction forcefully. If yes then forcefully moves frycook in said direction to clear obstacles. If no then re-pick a new direction to force move.
      Parameters:
      fryCook - : The frycook to move.

    • forceFryCookRightCheck

      public void forceFryCookRightCheck(FryCook fryCook)
      This method decides if the frycook can move in the choosen direction forcefully. If yes then forcefully moves frycook in said direction to clear obstacles. If no then re-pick a new direction to force move.
      Parameters:
      fryCook - : The frycook to move.

    • forceFryCookDownCheck

      public void forceFryCookDownCheck(FryCook fryCook)
      This method decides if the frycook can move in the choosen direction forcefully. If yes then forcefully moves frycook in said direction to clear obstacles. If no then re-pick a new direction to force move.
      Parameters:
      fryCook - : The frycook to move.

      Parameters:

      force - :Force parameter value
      caused - :Caused parameter value
